participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Anxious and expressive, tends to exaggerate situations.
participant_1.background: A college student who often misplaces things due to a hectic lifestyle.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Calm and reassuring, often the voice of reason in chaotic situations.
participant_2.background: A young professional who enjoys helping friends manage their stress.

content.text: Oh my god! My fogs are missing
